name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Site Reliability Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing and delivering robust backend systems and cloud-native architectures. Proficient in managing and optimizing systems using **GCP**, **GKE**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Helm**, and **Terraform**. Skilled in programming with **Python**, **GoLang**, **C++**, and **Java**, and well-versed in Linux environments and networking protocols. Expertise in API design, automation, and observability with tools such as **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, **OpenTelemetry**, and **Elasticsearch**. Strong ability to implement CI/CD processes and monitor system performance using observability tools and frameworks. Demonstrated success in contributing to high-impact projects for industry leaders like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, driving efficiency and reliability in critical systems.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **GCP** and **GKE** to engineer scalable backend services in **Python** and facilitate efficient deployment workflows for cloud applications.
Created **CI/CD** pipelines and utilized **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, enhancing the reliability of application deployments by **30%**.
Implemented observability strategies using **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **OpenTelemetry**, resulting in reduced incident response time by **40%**.
Engineered event-driven architectures utilizing **Kafka**, **Redis**, and **Celery** to manage asynchronous processing and improve transaction handling efficiency by **25%**.
Managed infrastructure using **Terraform** to automate deployments, enabling consistent and error-free cloud infrastructure by maintaining **99.9%** uptime.
Led security compliance efforts by integrating **SSO** solutions with **Okta** and implementing secure authentication methods, ensuring adherence to regulatory standards.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams in **Linux** environments, addressing integration challenges, and overseeing release strategies, contributing to a **15%** improvement in project timelines.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** to develop robust backend systems for automating document workflows and streamlining user onboarding with a performance improvement of **30%** in process efficiency.
Designed and implemented event-driven microservices employing **Celery** and **Redis**, enhancing the asynchronous processing of financial data and reducing transaction processing times by **25%**.
Managed and deployed microservices on **Azure App Services**, leveraging **Terraform** for infrastructure automation to ensure consistent and scalable environments across **5** different projects.
Engineered secure data pipelines using **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions** to facilitate the streamlined exchange of regulatory data, achieving a **40%** reduction in manual data handling errors.
Conducted thorough security audits to ensure compliance with industry standards, successfully integrating **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for managing secure authentication and access controls.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to achieve seamless system integration and regulatory compliance, leading to **100%** successful release management without critical incidents.

Utilized **GCP** and **GKE** to deploy scalable backend services for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, leveraging **Python** and **PostgreSQL** to enhance trading operations.
Engineered real-time price feed processors with **Redis**, **Kafka**, and **asyncio** to deliver up-to-the-minute trading data for high-frequency transactions, achieving a data refresh rate of **100ms**.
Collaborated closely with frontend teams to deliver data through **REST APIs** and **WebSocket** channels, ensuring seamless user interaction with the platform, managing over **50,000 concurrent connections**.
Ensured the platform met regulatory requirements, including **MiFID II** and **GDPR**, while adhering to internal data security protocols, successfully passing **3 audits** without incident.
Implemented comprehensive test suites using **PyTest** and **tox**, streamlining QA and CI/CD processes for efficient development cycles with an increased test coverage to **95%**.
Introduced job queuing and scheduling solutions with **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and process management, reducing job completion time by **30%**.
